member.name: D3D12_ROOT_PARAMETER
member.summary: Describes the slot of a root signature version 1.0.

member.name: D3D12_ROOT_PARAMETER.ParameterType
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the type of root signature slot. This member determines which type to use in the union below.

member.name: D3D12_ROOT_PARAMETER.DescriptorTable
member.summary: A structure that describes the layout of a descriptor table as a collection of descriptor ranges that appear one after the other in a descriptor heap.

member.name: D3D12_ROOT_PARAMETER.Constants
member.summary: A structure that describes constants inline in the root signature that appear in shaders as one constant buffer.

member.name: D3D12_ROOT_PARAMETER.Descriptor
member.summary: A structure that describes descriptors inline in the root signature that appear in shaders.

member.name: D3D12_ROOT_PARAMETER.ShaderVisibility
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the shaders that can access the contents of the root signature slot.
